reviews.author: David Kim
reviews.content: Wu worked 4 me 2 mow my dads lawn. was slow and ran over my shrubs. wuld not reccomend hiring.

reviews.author: Mike Johnson
reviews.content: Alaina Smalls is one of the most pleasant people to work with! As a volunteer at the Camp Korey Summer Camps, I can wholeheartedly say that I enjoyed working with Miss Smalls. Looking forward to volunteering at Camp Korey again this summer!

reviews.author: Jack Michaelson
reviews.content: Worked at Camp Korey as a waiter for one of their events. Was fun, but it quite a bit of work and time.
